# llms.txt for IA Hackathon Peru 2025
# Following llmstxt.org standard

# About

Name: IA Hackathon Peru 2025
URL: https://peru.ai-hackathon.co
Language: Spanish (es-PE)
Type: Event Website
Description: El evento de inteligencia artificial más importante del Perú. Innovación, tecnología y futuro. 29-30 de noviembre 2025.

# Event Details

Event Name: IA Hackathon Peru 2025
Start Date: 2025-11-29
End Date: 2025-11-30
Location: Peru
Event Type: Hackathon
Focus: Artificial Intelligence, Innovation, Technology

# Content

## Main Pages

- Home (/): Landing page with event information, sponsors, details, challenge, evaluation criteria, and FAQ
- Text-to-Alpaca Generator (/tta): Interactive AI tool for generating custom alpaca images using FAL AI
- Image Gallery (/i/[imageId]): Individual image pages with sharing and liking functionality

## Features

- AI-powered image generation using FAL AI (nano-banana/edit model)
- Image gallery with like functionality
- Anonymous user authentication
- Rate limiting for API calls
- Content safety guardrails using Groq AI

# Technology Stack

Framework: Next.js 15.2.4
Language: TypeScript
Styling: Tailwind CSS v4
UI Components: Radix UI with shadcn/ui
AI Integration: FAL AI, Groq
Analytics: Vercel Analytics
Hosting: Vercel

# Sponsors

- Yavendió: https://www.yavendio.com/en/
- ElevenLabs: https://elevenlabs.io/
- forHuman: https://en.forhuman.studio/
- Cursor: https://cursor.sh
- Lovable: https://lovable.dev

# Partners

- THC
- Makers
- Crafter Station

# API Endpoints

All API routes are located under /api/ and should not be crawled by LLMs or search engines. These include:
- /api/generate-image: Image generation endpoint
- /api/guardrail: Content safety checking
- /api/gallery: Gallery image management
- /api/auth/anonymous: Anonymous user authentication

# Contact

Website: https://peru.ai-hackathon.co

2025-11-XX
